post_title: Long layover in Rome - quick recommendations?

comments.author: RomeVacationTips
comments.body:
How long is long, and at what time of day?

Also where is your onward journey to, as that has an effect on how much time you have to play with.

comments.author: lrnzsmith
comments.body:
Depends on which airport you are. At Roma Termini you could take the Leonardo rapid train to the city center. Takes about an hour if you’ed include walking distance/buying tickets. Maybe faster if you are a local. Roma Urbe airport is closer to the city center. I‘ed take a Taxi.

In my opinion most restaurants in Roma are amazing. As well are the sights. Just pick one maybe. Have a nice stay!
